column5: Going across in the near future and 2 questions keep nagging me.1) Best each person fill out the ArriveCan App their own or complete on same App. There will be two of us in truck. 2) Best answer to quarantine plan question to simply say stay at the lodge?
I did it all for my group on one submission, just easier coordination. Q plan list your camp, they did not even ask. Easiest crossing I have had.
